Chandra is an extremely hard working, talented and resourceful web application engineer who always takes pride in representing his product team on larger forums such as company-wide tech talks. Besides his excellent front end development skills, Chandra has impressed me time and again with his full stack Java (and Ruby) development skills. One characteristic that truly differentiates Chandra from many other engineers is his ability to juggle across multiple tasks effectively while still upholding a friendly and enthusiastic demeanor for other cross-functional stakeholders (QA, Product, Operations). He will truly be a great asset for any web application development team. I give him my best recommendations and wish him good luck in everything he does.
